verses.html:
1
We praise Thee, O God! for the Son of Thy love,
For Jesus who died,
and is now gone above.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Hallelujah! Thine the glory.
Hallelujah! Amen.
Hallelujah! Thine the glory.
Revive us again.

2
We praise Thee, O God! for Thy Spirit of light,
Who hath shown us our Saviour,
and scattered our night.
